H0.text: The 1999 film, 'The Green Mile' was directed by whom. Frank Darabont

H1.text: The 1999 film, 'The Green Mile' was directed by whom. Quentin Tarantino

A4.text: Darabont's next directorial effort was another Stephen King adaptation for which he wrote the screenplay, The Green Mile, starring Tom Hanks.
